title: getLocaleDisplayName
name: getLocaleDisplayName
description:
Gets a locale value and displays the name in a manner
        that is appropriate to a specific locale. By default,
        gets the current locale in the current locale's language.

arguments.name: locale
arguments.description: Locale to use instead of the locale of the page when processing the function

arguments.name: dspLocale
arguments.description: The locale in which to return the name. The default is the locale defined for the request.
